title: Austin-area typophiles invited
content:
I will be giving a talk —  
"Classifying Printing Types: Maximilien Vox and the Power of Suggestion" —  
at the Design department of the University of Texas  
Wednesday Feb 24 at 6:00pm.
author: eliason

comments.content: What are the prospects of a ustream or vimeo event?

Probably close to zero, sorry to say.

Here's more info for locals:  
 [http://www.finearts.utexas.edu/events/detail.cfm?calset=aah&id=2678](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012060328/http:/www.finearts.utexas.edu/events/detail.cfm?calset=aah&id=2678 "http://www.finearts.utexas.edu/events/detail.cfm?calset=aah&id=2678")
Bump. Central Texas typophiles are invited to come tonight at 6pm at UT. Hope to see some of you there!
